feed.title: OliveTin Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2024.04.20 (broken)
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 3620197 feature: #267 add jq to containers (#278)

Bug fixes

  • 09e1de0 bugfix: Dont rename logo filenames (#282)
  • fafacfe bugfix: Move all inotify to filehelper (#279)
  • 5a644b0 bugfix: The web interface now refreshes when the config file is changed! (#281)

Others

  • 1a0ba6c build(deps): bump golang.org/x/net from 0.22.0 to 0.23.0 (#277)

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2024.04.20

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2024.04.20

Upgrade warnings, or breaking changes

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.

Useful links

  • Which download do I need?
  • Ask for help and chat with others users in the Discord community

Thanks for your interest in OliveTin!

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2024.04.26
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 12cf001 feature: extra args for fileindir (#291)

Bug fixes

  • 5057ba2 bugfix: Start filewatcher on different goroutines (#286)
  • dfca712 bugfix: Update icon on buttons (#288)

Others

  • a3aee36 More screenshots link (#289)
  • 7c6f36c doc: Update images
  • 8f1dfff fmt: Clean up log statement
